item.description:
@yurmoma1023 wrote:

i have this as code

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) { PkingDelay = 10; wepdelay = 10; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); }
but, it shoots way to fast
the arrows nbot the bow
is there a way to slow them down or
couls someone tell me wat ea number stands for?

ty,~Tim~
